bug.summary: The pause button is not checkable.
bug.description:
Describe the bug The pause button is not checkable. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Launch the Harvester GUI. Connecting a camera and start image acquisition. Click the pause button. You'll see the pause button doesn't stay in the pushed state.
Expected behavior The pause button must be implemented as a checkable button. Once it's pushed it must stay in the pushed state and it's pushed again it must stay in the non-pushed state.
